columns.title: Facility ID
columns.name: facility_id
columns.description: System‐GeneratedUniqueNumeric ID for a Child Care Program

columns.title: Program Type
columns.name: program_type
columns.description: FDC = Family Day Care; GFDC = Group Family Day Care; SACC = School Age Child Care; DCC = Day Care Center; SDCC = Small Day Care Center

columns.title: Region Code
columns.name: region_code
columns.description: ARO =Albany Regional Office; BRO =Buffalo Regional Office; LIRO = Long Island Regional Office; NYCDOHMH =NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene; RRO = Rochester Regional Office; SRO = Syracuse Regional Office; YRO = Spring Valley Regional Office

columns.title: County
columns.name: county
columns.description: NYS County

columns.title: Facility Status
columns.name: facility_status
columns.description: License = GFDC or DCC; Registration = FDC, SACC, SDCC; Pending Revocation = recommended for revocation; Pending Revocation & Denial = recommended for revocation/denial; Pending Denial = recommended for denial; Suspended = may not care for children

columns.title: Facility Name
columns.name: facility_name
columns.description: DBA (legal entity/doing business as) name or Legal Name (last name, first name)

columns.title: Facility Opened Date
columns.name: facility_opened_date
columns.description: Facility Opened Date

columns.title: License Issue Date
columns.name: license_issue_date
columns.description: License Issue Date

columns.title: License Expiration Date
columns.name: license_expiration_date
columns.description: License Expiration Date

columns.title: address omitted
columns.name: address_omitted
columns.description: As a result of a bill signed into law (Chapter 354 of the Laws of 2009), the dataset omits addresses for those child care providers who have “opted out” from having their addresses and map included.

columns.title: street number
columns.name: street_number
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out

columns.title: street name
columns.name: street_name
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out

columns.title: additional address
columns.name: additional_address
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out

columns.title: floor
columns.name: floor
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out

columns.title: apartment
columns.name: apartment
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out

columns.title: phone number omitted
columns.name: phone_number_omitted
columns.description: Excluded for providers who have unlisted phone numbers

columns.title: phone number
columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: Excluded for providers who have unlisted phone numbers

columns.title: phone extension
columns.name: phone_extension
columns.description: Excluded if provider has opted out or has unlisted phone number

columns.title: Provider Name
columns.name: provider_name
columns.description: Name of On-Site Provider/Director (Last name, First name). If not approved, “There is no approved Director/On-Site Provider at this site” appears

columns.title: school district name
columns.name: school_district_name
columns.description: Name of School District in which Program is located

columns.title: capacity description
columns.name: capacity_description
columns.description: This only applies if the Modality is FDC or GFDC

columns.title: Infant Capacity
columns.name: infant_capacity
columns.description: For DCC, total number of children up to 18 months of age

columns.title: Toddler Capacity
columns.name: toddler_capacity
columns.description: For DCC, total number of children ages 18 months to 36 months

columns.title: Preschool Capacity
columns.name: preschool_capacity
columns.description: For DCC, total number of children at least 3 years of age who are not yet enrolled in kindergarten or a higher grade

columns.title: School Age Capacity
columns.name: school_age_capacity
columns.description: For DCC and SACC, total number of children who are under 13 years of age who are enrolled in kindergarten or a higher grade

columns.title: Total Capacity
columns.name: total_capacity
columns.description: Refer to the data dictionary found in the About tab for the definition of Total Capacity.

columns.title: latitude
columns.name: latitude
columns.description: As a result of a bill signed into law (Chapter 354 of the Laws of 2009), the dataset omits addresses for those child care providers who have “opted out” from having their addresses and map included.

columns.title: longitude
columns.name: longitude
columns.description: As a result of a bill signed into law (Chapter 354 of the Laws of 2009), the dataset omits addresses for those child care providers who have “opted out” from having their addresses and map included.

columns.title: Counties
columns.name: :Computed_afrk7ibz_location
columns.description: Counties

columns.name: :Computed_9gf2g78j_location
columns.description: Metropolitan planning areas
